data.title: Personalized Medicine Market Size And Share Report, 2030
meta_keywords: Personalized Medicine Market - Global Personalized Medicine Industry Size
data.meta_description: The global personalized medicine market was valued at USD 529.28 billion in 2023 and is projected to grow at a CAGR of 8.20% from 2024 to 2030.
